insert_channel {"id": 1, "user_id": 1, "name": "foobar", "prefix": "+", "bot_name": "hortbot"}

handle hortbot @id=a8104228-d913-4446-88ce-607850a5c84c;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+command
send hortbot #foobar [HB] usage: +command add|delete|restrict ...

handle hortbot @id=068ac8b2-ab72-4c79-97da-12d7e1ee2317;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+command add
send hortbot #foobar [HB] usage: +command add <name> <text>

send hortbot #foobar [HB] usage: +command add <name> <text>
